titles: The Observator defended in a modest reply to the late Animadversions upon those notes the Observator published upon the seven doctrines and positions which the King by way of recapitulation layes open so offensive.
author: Parker, Henry, 1604-1652.
notes: Also published in the same year as: Animadversions animadverted.
Date and place of publication from Wing.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Animadversions animadverted, or" at head of title; "Aug: 26 1642".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Animadversions upon those notes which the late Observator hath published upon the seven doctrines and positions which the King by way of recapitulation (hee saith) layes open so offensive --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  Politics and government --  1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
